discover.title: Discover ESI
discover.desc: We are happy to welcome visits to ESI. Groups can enjoy a campus tour and an admissions presentation, as well as additional activities upon request. Tours are available on weekdays throughout the year.

localisation.desc: ESI is located 15 kilometers from downtown Algiers, 4 km from Houari Boumediene International Airport, and 2 kilometers from the University of Science and Technology Houari Boumediene (USTHB). It is served by the East Suburban Train 'Algiers-Dar El Beida-Thénia'.
